column2: The UNIX time for genesis block. Here the current time is not used but that is OK for this local sidechain.
Not used by a PoA blockchain so a random value is supplied.
Not used by a PoA blockchain so a random value is supplied.
The version of the genesis block. Note that this is different from transaction versioning.
There is no reward for mining the genesis block as any transaction output for the genesis block cannot be spent.
Used as input to the first genesis block transaction.
